### 🛠 **Tech Stack & Tools:**  

- **MuleSoft**: Anypoint Studio | Anypoint Platform | CloudHub

### 📌 **Projects & Contributions:**  
✔️ Designed & implemented enterprise-level **API Integrations** using **MuleSoft Anypoint Platform**.  
✔️ Developed reusable **DataWeave** scripts for optimized **data transformations**.  
✔️ Created & managed **RAML-based API specifications**.  
✔️ Deployed applications on **CloudHub** with monitoring & logging configurations.  
✔️ Integrated systems using **HTTP, SFTP, FTP, Database Connectors**.
